sentences.sentence: Presently a large cockchafer flew by;
sentences.translation: 这时有一只很大的金龟子飞来了。

sentences.sentence: Suddenly a great cockchafer buzzed along.
sentences.translation: 突然一只很大的金龟子嗡嗡嗡飞过。

sentences.sentence: Suddenly a great cockchafer buzzed along. Alas!
sentences.translation: 突然一只很大的金龟子嗡嗡嗡飞过。
